channel.title: Magic handler help (damges)
channel.description: ugg no matter what i do it will never hit damage im posting my magic handler in the attachment at the bottom just so someone can help me im not tell where to declare anything cus i dont want people leeching this is the magic handler ill be posting on rs related so if you can help out ill give ya some credits i have all the possible things for damage in there but it just doesnt work

item.description:

yes i added it to my methods

server.mh.mplayer(spellID, this, playerIndex);

and no i wont name my stuff better lol
yes client class is main class

item.title: Magic handler help (damges)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Did you add it in your magic method? That your calling it?

And everywhere else that it calls it?

server.MagicHandler.mplayer(spellID,

Wtf is main m and int index suppose to be? Name your shit better!

Then find this in client class:

AttackMage(playerIndexx);

Change it to:

server.MagicHandler.mplayer(etc.);

EDIT:

Ohhhh! Your “client class” is called “main class”?

Because i would get it.

I would use:

public void attackMage(client c, ID);

IDK why you put spellID in there? If its already declared, or SHOULD be declared in mh class.

Read full topic
